comments.body:
It seems that we have exposed this in 3.1.0(3.1.1) already: https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/branch-3.1/core/src/main/scala/org/apache/spark/internal/config/package.scala

Why do we change the version here? The feature is not ready in 3.1?
Yes, the feature was not ready in 3.1. It will be ready only in 3.2 which is why I changed it to 3.2 to keep it consistent.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +2103,2107 @@        "org.apache.spark.network.shuffle.MergedShuffleFileManager implementation for push-based " +
        "shuffle to be enabled")
      .version("3.2.0")
      .booleanConf
      .createWithDefault(false)
